definition: to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Chinese leaders that Russia will fulfil the Sino-Russian border agreement faithfully.
sentences.chinese: 中國領導人說，俄羅斯將履行中俄邊界協議的回信。

sentences.english: You must not postpone answering his letter any longer.
sentences.chinese: 你不可再延後給他回信。

sentences.english: So I wrote enquires to two colleges, but both replied that their students quotas were already full. (semantic addition)
sentences.chinese: 我就寫信去問兩個學院，回信都說學額早滿了。

sentences.english: She wondered why they hadn't given her an answer.
sentences.chinese: 她納悶兒爲什麼他們沒給她回信。

sentences.english: Old goat received an Zhenghun reply.
sentences.chinese: 老色鬼收到了一封徵婚回信。

sentences.english: Your cooperate is returning the enclosed form promptly would be much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 我公司將非常感謝貴方早日寄回信內所附的表格。

sentences.english: I haven't written because I have been so depressed.
sentences.chinese: 實不相瞞，一直沒回信的原因是，我情緒低落。

sentences.english: He wrote back to her out of courtesy.
sentences.chinese: 他禮貌性地給她寫了一封回信。

sentences.english: Iid like to spend less of my time picking up letters.
sentences.chinese: 我希望回信的時間花得少一點。

sentences.english: He replied to Hogan and sent him a plot of the noise.
sentences.chinese: 他回信給霍根並寄去一段噪音的曲線圖。

sentences.english: Read the letter, and then write a reply.
sentences.chinese: 讀下面這封信，然後寫一封回信。

sentences.english: To her surprise, Premier Wen wrote back to her.
sentences.chinese: 令她沒想到的是，溫總理真的回信了。

sentences.english: No sooner than I woke up after my mid-night journey , had I written that letter .
sentences.chinese: 現在我應該快收到你們的回信了，呵呵。

sentences.english: He would write if you would answer.
sentences.chinese: 如果你回信的話，他就寫信。

sentences.english: But I have an aunt, too, who must not be longer neglected.
sentences.chinese: 可惜我也有一位舅母，再不能不回信給她了。

definition: to send word/to deliver a letter
to reply to a telegram/to wire back
